ygData.msgSnippet: I think if they implemented this idea, they would probably do what they did with the gate potions-- make them ridiculously expensive at something like 1200
ygData.messageBody:
I think if they implemented this idea, they would probably do what they did
with the gate potions-- make them ridiculously expensive at something like
1200 plat for one. That would squelch any ideas of having infinite mana.
Although I admit, it seems a little excessive to me.


----- Original Message -----
From: Mike Calhoun <ninxf@...>
To: EQ <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, September 19, 1999 1:49 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] (no subject)


> From: Mike Calhoun <ninxf@...>
>
> I still think that they should have something that restores some mana
> that you could buy at the stores. I told this idea to a friend of mine
> and he said that would make Wizards have infinate mana. So I said what
> if there was something like a "Wizards Pouch" and It could hold like 10
> of these mana restoring items and the items can only be placed in this
> bag. And a wizard can only have one bag. That would limit the amount
> of these items to 10. Therefore making us better at soloing but wouldnt
> let us have infinate mana.
